name: Bork Inu
description: BORK aims to further grow the meme token industry through this decentralized token. The objective is to raise awareness to dogs and to do small donations from the marketing wallet to dogs in need. A community meme token based off the bork memes. The project is composed of 3 main parts: liquidity pool acquisition, burns, and redistribution. One can earn passive BORK income by holding. With an experienced core team, the project aims to reach greater heights. BORK has a simple tokenomics of 12% tax on each buy/sell. 2% is burned, 2% goes to liquidity pool, 2% is redistributed, 2% for developers, 2% for community moderation and 2% for operations and marketing.
